title: Global Education Recruiter Training Program
description: Master the skills needed to become a successful education recruiter and help students achieve their academic goals globally.
fullDescription: This comprehensive training program equips you with the knowledge and skills to excel as an education recruiter. Learn how to guide students through the application process, understand international education systems, and build successful recruitment strategies. The program runs from March 12 â€“ May 7, 2026, with live, instructor-led online training sessions and access to session recordings for flexible learning.
whatYoullLearn: The Global Education Recruitment Ecosystem: Understand how the international student recruitment industry operates across high schools, colleges, and universities.
Ethical Recruitment Practices: Learn how to ethically guide and support international students from inquiry to enrollment.
Admissions & Systems Knowledge: Gain insight into admission cycles, program types, and institution requirements worldwide.
Institutional Partnership Building: Learn how to secure contracts and collaborations with educational institutions across multiple countries.
Legal & Compliance Awareness: Understand how to reference study permit and visa information responsibly without offering immigration advice.
